name: Recoil (itch) (sabs546)
description:
Is still a work in progress. Originally meant to be a game in a day project, I decided to continue with it. Use your missiles to blast yourself away from the kill zone and to hit your enemies into it instead.

A - Fires the left cannon

D - Fires the right cannon

Space - Fires the main cannon

Two files included, one that was done in a day, another with the continuing game
